description.value:
You gain two of the following powers of your choice.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.FpUXxsqig8w9YQVH]{Aspect of the Charging Ram}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.zn5fgWu0dByKUF1k]{Aspect of the Cunning Fox}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.vxX03nLmqf12Etcj]{Aspect of the Dancing Serpent}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ZD08eBkM1KxvR25y]{Aspect of the Hungry Shark}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.P3IC7zhlkWiDJpuA]{Aspect of the Lurking Spider}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.RyWGBPYcmZwf6CkU]{Aspect of the Pack Wolf}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.J0G5uMVi92DPELYd]{Aspect of the Regal Lion}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.sWQ0nRgdwKjpE2Mi]{Aspect of the Soaring Hawk}
